00047         // Chunk section within a wav file ('data'/'fact'/'cue' etc..)
00048         typedef struct
00049         {
00050                 char chunkID[4];            // 'data' or 'fact'
00051                 long int length;
00052         } ChunkHeader;

00057         typedef struct
00058         {
00059                 char mRIFF[4];                                          // 'RIFF'
00060                 unsigned long int mLength;
00061                 char mWAVE[4];                                          // 'WAVE'
00062                 char mFMT[4];                                           // 'fmt '
00063                 unsigned long int mHeaderSize;          // varies...

00066                 unsigned long int mSamplesPerSec;
00067                 unsigned long int mAvgBytesPerSec;
00068                 unsigned short int mBlockAlign;      
00069                 unsigned short int mBitsPerSample;
00070         } WaveHeader;
